# 利用 Python 进行数据分析 第二版 中文精要

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/liyong-python-jinxing-shujufenxi-dier-ban-zhongwen-jingyao
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/liyong-python-jinxing-shujufenxi-dier-ban-zhongwen-jingyao
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install liyong-python-jinxing-shujufenxi-dier-ban-zhongwen-jingyao
liyong-python-jinxing-shujufenxi-dier-ban-zhongwen-jingyao <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g liyong-python-jinxing-shujufenxi-dier-ban-zhongwen-jingyao
liyong-python-jinxing-shujufenxi-dier-ban-zhongwen-jingyao <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
